PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13182022-12-15,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFirst Nations Goods and Services Tax Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedules 1 and 2 to the First Nations Goods and Services Tax Act
PrecisOrder Amending Schedules 1 and 2 to the FIRST NATIONS GOODS AND SERVICES TAX ACT in order to (1) add the names of seven requesting First Nations, their governing bodies, and the description of their reserves to Schedule 1; and (2) change the name of one First Nation in Schedule 2.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0275 Publication Date: 2023-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: Order Amending Schedules 1 and 2 to the FIRST NATIONS GOODS AND SERVICES TAX ACT in order to (1) add the names of seven requesting First Nations, their governing bodies, and the description of their reserves to Schedule 1; and (2) change the name of one First Nation in Schedule 2.
